function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of access to gynecologic oncologist specialists for rural women with ovarian cancer","Impact":"Delays in receiving appropriate surgical care and treatment, leading to potential disease progression and poorer outcomes","Mitigation":"Increase the availability of gynecologic oncologist specialists in rural areas, implement telemedicine for specialist consultations, and provide financial assistance for travel to urban centers","Technologies":"Telemedicine for remote specialist consultations, mobile medical units for rural areas, and digital health platforms for virtual care","People":"Rural women with ovarian cancer","Owner":"Healthcare providers, government health agencies, and nonprofit organizations"},{"Description":"Disparities in referral rates for rural women with ovarian cancer","Impact":"Limited access to timely and specialized care, resulting in delayed diagnosis and treatment, and increased risk of disease progression","Mitigation":"Raise awareness among primary care providers about the importance of timely referral, improve access to transportation for rural patients, and implement education and training programs for healthcare professionals in rural areas","Technologies":"Telemedicine for remote consultations, mobile transportation services, and online education platforms for healthcare professionals","People":"Rural women with ovarian cancer, primary care providers, and healthcare professionals","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government health agencies, and medical education institutions"},{"Description":"Longer time from diagnosis to surgery for rural women with ovarian cancer","Impact":"Increased risk of disease progression and poorer surgical outcomes due to delayed intervention","Mitigation":"Improve coordination between primary care providers and specialist centers, reduce administrative barriers to specialist referrals, and implement expedited pathways for rural patients with suspected ovarian cancer","Technologies":"Digital health platforms for streamlined referrals, electronic health record systems for seamless information sharing, and mobile medical units for on-site consultations","People":"Rural women with suspected ovarian cancer, primary care providers, and specialist centers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government health agencies, and medical technology providers"}]}
